fields.description:
KitchenSink app fails to login Facebook. Please see the attachments for more details about error messages.

h5. Steps To Reproduce
1. Install and Launch KitchenSink App
2. Go to Mashups -> Facebook -> Login/Logout
3. Click on the Facebook Login button

h5. Expected Result
Facebook should be logged in.

h5. Actual Result
It shows some Graph API versioning errors. Please see the attachment *Screen Shot 2014-12-26 at 12.29.08 PM.png*
If we click OK button on above screen, we'll get some error alert. Please see the attachment *Screen Shot 2014-12-26 at 12.29.18 PM.png*
fields.summary: KitchenSink: App Fails to login Facebook
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK: 3.5.0.v20141222103320
Appc-Studio:  3.4.1 GA
Titanium CLI: 3.4.1 GA
Alloy : 1.5.1 GA
Xcode : 6.1
OS: OSX 10.10.1
Device : iPhone 6plus (iOS 8.1)

comments.body: The used Graph API / Facebook SDK has been updated in recent updates of Ti.Facebook (5.0.0 and later)
